contentList:
Oath of Ten Veils A living prism through which the Light of Heaven shines forth, you act in the world to combat the agents of darkness wherever you may find them. Oath of Ten Veils Tenets Oath of Ten Veils paladins abide by the following tenets:

The Light of Heaven shines through each veil in a different way, but each is still a part of the whole.

Illuminate the world with the brilliance of righteousness, dispersing darkness through noble deeds.

No matter how dim it grows, the Light will never go out. Regalia You and any nearby allies take [1] less damage from all elemental sources. The aura disappears if you fall Unconscious. The paladin and any allies within [1] take [2] less damage from all elemental sources. Allies within [1] take [2] less damage from all elemental sources. Elemental Veils Container name Weave a mystical veil out of the Light of Heaven and shroud your weapons with it, converting your damage into one of the elements. The chosen veil persists until you complete a Long Rest. Veil of Basmu Imbue your weapon attacks with corrosive energy, changing the damage type to Acid.

Acid damage you deal inflicts Acid for 2 turns. If Acid is already inflicted, you create a cloud of acid around the victim for 2 turns instead. Veil of Suen Imbue your weapon attacks with freezing energy, changing the damage type to Cold.

Those you strike with Cold damage are Encrusted with Frost for 2 turns. Veil of Shamash Imbue your weapon attacks with scorching energy, changing the damage type to Fire.

When you deal Fire damage, you also Burn the target for 2 turns. Veil of Ki Imbue your weapon attacks with eldritch energy, changing the damage type to Force.

Force damage you deal adds your Proficiency Bonus to the damage dealt. Veil of Enlil Imbue your weapon attacks with fulminating energy, changing the damage type to Lightning.

When you deal Lightning damage, you gain 2 Lightning Charges. Veil of Ereshkigal Imbue your weapon attacks with deathly energy, changing the damage type to Necrotic.

When you deal Necrotic damage, those affected cannot regain hit points for 2 turns. The affected entity cannot regain hit points. Veil of Erra Imbue your weapon attacks with noxious energy, changing the damage type to Poison.

Poison damage you deal inflicts Toxic Buildup for 2 turns. Toxic Buildup %%%|TOXIC BUILDUP ONCE TECHNICAL| Affected entity takes [2] per remaining turn.

When the entity has [1] or more turns of Toxic Buildup, it must scucceed on a Saving Throw or become poisoned for 3 turns. Toxic Buildup is removed afterward.

If the entity is already poisoned, it instead becomes Vulnerable to poison for 3 turns.

Removed by healing. Toxic Shock The affected entity is Vulnerable to Poison damage. Veil of Enki Imbue your weapon attacks with mental energy, changing the damage type to Psychic.

Psychic damage you deal inflicts Mental Fatigue for 2 turns. Veil of An Imbue your weapon attacks with brilliant energy, changing the damage type to Radiant.

The first time you deal Radiant damage to an enemy each turn, you heal [1]. Veil of Ishkur Imbue your weapon attacks with crepitating energy, changing the damage type to Thunder.

Thunder damage you deal inflicts 2 turns of Reverberation Relinquish the Veils Remove any veils that are affecting you or weapons you are wielding. Elemental Overload Overload your connection to the Light of Heaven, manifesting the veils to flare and billow around your strikes. All elemental damage you deal for 1 turn is increased by [1]. Eye of Heaven You briefly see the world bathed in a spectrum of colored lights. The colors highlight important information, granting you Advantage on Investigation and Perception for 1 turn.
